title: Web Development Playground
description: Series of web pages developed in the pursuit of html/css/javascript knowledge.

title: Perlin Noise Flow Field Simulator
description: An interactive canvas using P5.js to simulate particle physics through a perlin noise flow field.

title: NYU Augmented Library Mobile App
description: A mobile application designed at NYU with the aim of providing NYU Dibner library users ease of access to all services through the use of AR technology.

title: Discord Bot Animal Racer
description: A small discord bot using the Discord API to create a small racing game with animal emojis between multiple users.

title: Bash and Powershell Scripts
description: A handful of bash and powershell scripts that provide use in work and projects

title: Spotify Manager
description: A desktop application that allows Spotify users to create back ups of playlist and song information through the spotify API.

title: Python Hot Reloading
description: A python module designed to hot reload python files, similar to javascript hot reloading. This allows changes to be made the program while it is running

title: Assembly Compiler
description: A python module designed to hot reload python files, similar to javascript hot reloading. This allows changes to be made the program while it is running

title: Assembly Simulator
description: A python module designed to hot reload python files, similar to javascript hot reloading. This allows changes to be made the program while it is running
